ticket.title: No API for introspecting routes (AWDwR3, section 21.2)
ticket.original-body:
Given:
rs = ActionController::Routing::Routes
2.3.4 results:
GET /users(.:format)? {:controller=>"users", :action=>"index"} POST /users(.:format)? {:controller=>"users", :action=>"create"} GET /users/new(.:format)? {:controller=>"users", :action=>"new"} ...
3.0pre results:
puts rs.routes #<Rack::Mount::Route:0x987c630> #<Rack::Mount::Route:0x9861f88> #<Rack::Mount::Route:0x9852ccc> ...
ticket.latest-body:
Given:
rs = ActionController::Routing::Routes
2.3.4 results:
GET /users(.:format)? {:controller=>"users", :action=>"index"} POST /users(.:format)? {:controller=>"users", :action=>"create"} GET /users/new(.:format)? {:controller=>"users", :action=>"new"} ...
3.0pre results:
puts rs.routes #<Rack::Mount::Route:0x987c630> #<Rack::Mount::Route:0x9861f88> #<Rack::Mount::Route:0x9852ccc> ...
ticket.original-body-html:
Given:

rs = ActionController::Routing::Routes

2.3.4 results:

GET /users(.:format)? {:controller=>"users", :action=>"index"}
POST /users(.:format)? {:controller=>"users", :action=>"create"}
GET /users/new(.:format)? {:controller=>"users", :action=>"new"}
...

3.0pre results:

puts rs.routes

<Rack::Mount::Route:0x987c630>

<Rack::Mount::Route:0x9861f88>

<Rack::Mount::Route:0x9852ccc>

...

version.body:
Given:
rs = ActionController::Routing::Routes
2.3.4 results:
puts rs.routes @@@ GET /users(.:format)? {:controller=>"users", :action=>"index"} POST /users(.:format)? {:controller=>"users", :action=>"create"} GET /users/new(.:format)? {:controller=>"users", :action=>"new"} @@@ ...
3.0pre results:
puts rs.routes @@@ #<Rack::Mount::Route:0x987c630> #<Rack::Mount::Route:0x9861f88> #<Rack::Mount::Route:0x9852ccc> @@@
...
version.body-html:
Given:

rs = ActionController::Routing::Routes

2.3.4 results:

puts rs.routes

GET    /users(.:format)?                        {:controller=>"users", :action=>"index"}
POST   /users(.:format)?                        {:controller=>"users", :action=>"create"}
GET    /users/new(.:format)?                    {:controller=>"users", :action=>"new"}
...

3.0pre results:

puts rs.routes

 #<Rack::Mount::Route:0x987c630>
 #<Rack::Mount::Route:0x9861f88>
 #<Rack::Mount::Route:0x9852ccc>

...
version.title: No API for introspecting routes (AWDwR3, section 21.2)

version.body:
